name: Heroes of Egypt
description:
After having been safely locked away in a temple for ages, sinister powers are accidentally unleashed causing chaos to spread and a dangerous curse to take hold!

Lead the Egyptians through different landscapes, make walkable paths, build incredible structures, and defeat dangerous creatures in order to banish the dark forces and lift the curse!

Popular click management mechanics
Follow the Egyptians through many adventures
Earn awards and trophies
Non-timed mode for a relaxed gaming experience
Challenging and entertaining
